item.title: Guitar Tuning Cheat Shirt Eddie Ate Dynamite Good Bye Eddie - Black Design
item.description: The funny saying on this shirt is a mnemonic for the 6 guitar strings in standard tuning: EADGBE. Wear it and every time you glance down at it you will be reminded of the notes of the open strings. / This cheat shirt for guitarists shows “EDDIE ATE DYNAMITE GOOD BYE EDDIE” in a vertical layout over the 6 strings and the numbers used to refer to the strings. The design is rotated by 180 degree to help the guitar player wearing it. • Also buy this artwork on apparel.
